images.title: Mat Fascione / Public Footpath near Quorn, Leicestershire
images.caption: Public Footpath near Quorn, Leicestershire

description: This Leicestershire based village is positioned just south of Loughborough in a pleasant riverside location. This circular walk from the village visits some of the local highlights including the waterside paths along the Grand Union Canal, the River Soar and Swithland Reservoir. You'll also visit the neighbouring settlements of Barrow upon Soar and Mountsorrel with a section along the long distance Leicestershire Round too.
display_address: Rawlins CE Academy, High Street, Quorndon, Quorn, Charnwood, Leicestershire, England, LE12 8DY, United Kingdom
